findings.title: Minting of unlimited number of sundae tokens
findings.description: The _mint function allows minting an unlimited number of tokens.

findings.title: Unprotected function calls in transfer and approve functions
findings.description: The transfer and approve functions do not have proper access control, allowing unauthorized users to call these functions.

findings.title: Unprotected function call in increaseAllowance function
findings.description: The increaseAllowance function contains an unprotected function call which can lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Unprotected function call in decreaseAllowance function
findings.description: The decreaseAllowance function contains an unprotected function call, which can lead to unauthorized access or manipulation of allowance.

findings.title: Unprotected function call in _transfer function
findings.description: The _transfer function contains an unprotected function call, which can lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Unprotected function call in _mint function
findings.description: The _mint function contains an unprotected function call which can lead to unauthorized token creation.

findings.title: Unprotected function call in _burn function
findings.description: The burn function allows the smart contract owner to burn assets without proper protection.

findings.title: Unprotected function call in _approve function
findings.description: The _approve function contains an unprotected function call, which can lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Unprotected function call in claimStuckTokens function
findings.description: The claimStuckTokens function has an unprotected function call which can lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Unprotected function call in burn function
findings.description: The burn function allows the smart contract owner to execute transfers of a specified number of tokens to a burn address without proper protection.
